description: Assesses basic opinion writing with reasons

levels.4: Opinion is crystal clear and stated confidently
levels.2: Opinion is present but unclear or wishy-washy

feedback_stems.strength: Your opinion was clear and confident when you wrote
feedback_stems.growth: State your opinion right away so readers know exactly what you think

levels.4: At least 2 strong reasons that clearly support the opinion
levels.3: 2 reasons that connect to the opinion
levels.2: 1 reason or reasons that don't clearly support opinion

feedback_stems.growth: Add another reason using 'because' to make your opinion stronger

levels.4: Uses 'because' or similar words to connect opinions and reasons smoothly
levels.3: Attempts to connect opinions and reasons
levels.2: Reasons are listed but not connected to opinion
levels.1: No connection between opinion and reasons

feedback_stems.strength: You connected your reasons well using
feedback_stems.growth: Use 'because' to show why your reasons support your opinion
